This is pretty terrible. MC is just a manwhore that doesn't care one bit about the girls. That'd not be bad if this was just porn, in fact it fits well with most of the girl characters in this - the captain, teacher and track club sluts. But then the author went and tried to build a more serious story around it, with two girls that completely do not fit the bill and would never go for such a guy. Even if we assume he successfully fooled Wakaba and she never found out what he's like, the FMC had his number from the get go and just doesn't make sense.

i like harem, but... turn the MC in a public dildo kind of pissed me ,i can undertand the author adding the masoquist teacher to create some kind of background to justify the sluty loose swim captain character but the other sluts was out of place and unnecessary  .And was wrong with MC personality?.. he change way to sudenly from alpha/sado to play thing mode ,and finally the "last fuck" forcefull cheap drama with the captain let a unnecessary bittersweet ending
All doujin artist needs to see this masterpiece, is not necessary to have a bunch of girls to have a nice harem story, like this, 3 is enough :3

The author's first tankoboun? And what is this? https://nhentai.net/g/86455/ or this? https://nhentai.net/g/90277/ Aren't these also tankoboun?
This artist has already been around for at least 10 years. Maybe I'm getting the definition of tankoboun wrong, or do they mean "first tankoboun with this publisher"

what can i say this is one of the best's. story is good having some anal would be interesting but i wouldnt change the story. it's already good enough. if i were to actually change something i'd make it longer xD

I'm sure if they reupload this now it will have many more favorites. This is amazing and beautiful story for me and really love it. I think she going to tell him "i love you" in last chapter. Maybe it looks like harem ending, but i think artist focus on Akane and she wins. I really like Akane the most and i'll be happy if they end up together. Waiting for more stories from that artist and i'll be hyped if he make another chapter with Akane ina future or something when they are together.
